name: rx-brain
description: An experiment to create an artificial brain that develops and persists itself as source code

scripts.update:all: npm run update:cli && npm run update:packages && npm run update:types
scripts.update:packages: npm install --save typescript@latest rxjs@latest my-ts@latest && npm install --save-dev jest@latest tslint@latest semantic-release@latest commitizen@latest cz-conventional-changelog@latest
scripts.update:cli: npm install -g typescript@latest jest@latest tslint@latest rimraf@latest semantic-release-cli@latest commitizen@latest cz-conventional-changelog@latest codecov@latest
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post

author: Henri d'Orgeval
